General.Name: Balwin Properties Ltd
General.Description: Balwin Properties Limited engages in the development and sale of residential properties in South Africa. The company offers sectional-title residential apartments under build-to-sell model. It also rents apartments, as well as electronic communication products. The company was formerly known as Balwin Properties Proprietary Limited. Balwin Properties Limited was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Johannesburg, South Africa.
General.Address: Townsend Office Park, Johannesburg, South Africa
